english_example_sentence: My family and I will not lift these old and heavy boxes from the warehouse.
russian_example_sentence: Моя семья и я не будем поднимать эти старые и тяжелые коробки со склада.
turkish_example_sentence: Ailem ve ben bu eski ve ağır kutuları depodan kaldırmayacağız.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ailem ve ben bu eski ve ağır kutuları depodan ______.
